node.text:
Are you a fan of virtual worlds? All immersive technology where you get to create an avatar and a digital identity? That is Ioana Matei’s life every day! 

Ioana is a P&G trailblazer as the architect behind #PGLifeLab - an immersive virtual world that showcases P&G innovations for all to explore. #PGInnovation 

Ioana says her love for technology started as a young girl playing Atari. Her dad would have to limit her time on the gaming system because it would overheat! 

Ioana lives her passion outside of work, too! She champions women in immersive technology through an NGO she started in Europe. Outside of work she stays in creative spaces – making art and films alongside her husband, who is a horror genre filmmaker. Swipe left to see Ioana directing! 

The Signal Trailblazers series features P&G, managers and executives around the globe who are innovating new ways to make business a force for good and a force for growth. #PGTrailblazers #PGSignal
Great to see you again Ioana also on this platform. Really applaud your achievements! You are a great example
Great to see you again Ioana also on this platform. Really applaud your achievements! You are a great example
